column4: i just downloaded mummy tomb of the dragon  movie by torrent. its says 'content blocked. the movie can be viewd by go media player'   and the go media player is not free. any other options i have?
Where do you see this message and what media player are you currently trying?
So are you sure you didn't just download an advertisement for "go" player?
So how does that answer my question?
and it gives the msg when played. dl go player. content blocked
You said the message was in the player on the screen, no?
So, again, what makes you think you didn't just download a 700 MB advertisement? You wouldn't be the first.
i dl 2 files. each with a diff media requiremnt
and that file was hosted by many users. any way. never mind
Companies can fake seeds/peers to make a torrent look popular
